languages.text: {n}Чем дольше вы смотрите на Идиру, тем больше странностей замечаете в ее облике. Странный землистый оттенок лица. Тонкие лиловые прожилки вокруг пересохших потрескавшихся губ. Изменившийся оттенок поблекших глаз. У вас возникает неприятное ощущение, словно женщина перед вами не совсем жива.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Чем дольше вы смотрите на Идиру, те больше странностей замечаете в ее облике. Странный землистый оттенок лица. Тонкие лиловые прожилки вокруг пересохших потрескавшихся губ. Изменившийся оттенок поблекших глаз. У вас возникает неприятное ощущение, словно женщина перед вами не совсем жива.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чем дольше вы смотрите на Идиру, тем больше странностей замечаете в ее облике. Странный землистый оттенок лица. Тонкие лиловые прожилки вокруг пересохших потрескавшихся губ. Изменившийся оттенок поблекших глаз. У вас возникает неприятное ощущение, словно женщина перед вами не совсем жива.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice in her appearance. The odd, earthy tone of her face. The thin purple veins around her parched, cracked lips. The subtle change in the colour of her now-lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, like the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice in her appearance. The odd, earthy tone of her face. The thin purple veins around her parched, cracked lips. The subtle change in the colour of her now-lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, like the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, like the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, like the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラを見れば見るほど、彼女の外見について奇妙な点が目につくようになる。奇妙な土気色の顔。干からびてひび割れた唇の周りの薄い紫色の血管。輝きを失った目の色の微妙な変化。目の前に立っている女性がまるで生きていないような、不快な感覚があなたを襲う。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラを見れば見るほど、彼女の外見について奇妙な点が目につくようになる。奇妙な土気色の顔。干からびてひび割れた唇の周りの薄い紫色の血管。輝きを失った目の色の微妙な変化。目の前に立っている女性がまるで生きていないような、不快な感覚があなたを襲う。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}你越是注视伊迪拉，就越是察觉到她的外表变得和以前不一样了。她的脸上流露着古怪而朴实的神色，干裂的嘴唇周围布满了细密的紫色血管，眼神也微妙地失去了光泽。某种令人不安的怪异感笼罩着你，就好像你面前的这个女人已经失去了生机一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你越是注视伊迪拉，就越是察觉到她的外表变得和以前不一样了。她的脸上流露着古怪而朴实的深色，干裂的嘴唇周围布满了细密的紫色血管，眼神也微妙地失去了光泽。某种令人不安的怪异感笼罩着你，就好像你面前的这个女人已经失去了生机一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuanto más te fijas en Idira, de más detalles extraños te percatas sobre su apariencia: el peculiar tono terroso de su rostro, las delgadas venas moradas en torno a sus labios secos y resquebrajados; el sutil cambio de color de sus ojos, ahora carentes de brillo. Te asalta la inquietante sensación de que algo no va bien, como si la mujer que está frente a ti no estuviera del todo viva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuanto más te fijas en Idira, de más detalles extraños te percatas sobre su apariencia. El peculiar tono terroso de su rostro. Las delgadas venas moradas en torno a sus labios secos y resquebrajados. El sutil cambio de color de sus ojos, ahora carentes de brillo. Te asalta la inquietante sensación de que algo no va bien, como si la mujer que está frente a ti no estuviera del todo viva.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Je länger du Idira ansiehst, desto mehr sonderbare Details fallen dir an ihrem Erscheinungsbild auf. Der merkwürdige, irdene Ton ihres Gesichts. Die violetten Adern, die ihre brüchigen Lippen umgeben. Der subtile Farbwechsel in ihren glanzlosen Augen. Dich beschleicht das unangenehme Gefühl, dass hier etwas nicht stimmt, als wäre die Frau, die vor dir steht nicht wirklich lebendig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je länger du Idira ansiehst, desto mehr sonderbare Details fallen dir an ihrem Erscheinungsbild auf. Der merkwürdige, irdene Teint ihres Gesichts. Die dünnen, violetten Adern rund um ihre trockenen, rissigen Lippen. Die subtile Änderung in der Farbe ihrer nun glanzlosen Augen. Dich beschleicht das unangenehme Gefühl, dass hier etwas nicht ganz stimmt, als sei die Frau, die vor dir steht nicht vollständig lebendig.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Plus vous regardez Idira, plus vous remarquez de détails étranges dans son apparence. Le teint terreux de son visage. Les fines veines pourpres autour de ses lèvres parcheminées. Le changement subtil dans la couleur de ses yeux désormais ternes. Vous sentez que quelque chose ne va pas, comme si la femme qui se tient devant vous n'était pas tout à fait vivante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plus vous regardez Idira, plus vous remarquez de détails étranges dans son apparence. Le teint terreux de son visage. Les fines veines pourpres autour de ses lèvres parcheminées. Le changement subtil dans la couleur de ses yeux désormais ternes. Vous sentez que quelque chose ne va pas, comme si la femme qui se tenait devant vous n'était pas tout à fait vivante.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira'ya baktıkça görünüşünde acayip ayrıntılar fark edip duruyorsun: Tuhaf ve süssüz yüzü, kuruluktan çatlamış dudaklarının etrafındaki mor renkli ince damarlar, artık donuk gözlerindeki hafif renk değişimi. İçini nahoş bir terslik hissi sarıyor... Karşında duran kadın, tam olarak hayatta değilmiş gibi geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you look at Idira, the more strange details you notice about her appearance: the odd, earthy tone of her face; the fine purple veins around her parched, cracked lips; the subtle change in the colour of her now lustreless eyes. An unpleasant sense of wrongness comes over you, as if the woman standing before you is not quite alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'ya baktıkça görünüşünde acayip ayrıntılar fark edip duruyorsun: Yüzünün tuhaf, süssüz duruşu; kuruluktan çatlamış dudaklarının etrafındaki mor renkli ince damarlar; artık donuk gözlerindeki hafif renk değişimi. İçini nahoş bir terslik hissi sarıyor; sanki karşında duran kadın tamamen hayatta değilmiş gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
